mapper.sql: order_id, order_no, order_cle_orderid, order_cle_orderno, order_datetime, order_statusval, order_amount, order_paytype, order_userid, created_date, created_by, updated_date, updated_by, delete_flag
mapper.select: select a.*, b.* from cle_tip_order a left join s_dictionary b ON a.order_statusval = b.value where order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select a.*, b.* from cle_tip_order a left join s_dictionary b ON a.order_statusval = b.value where order_cle_orderid = #{orderCleOrderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.*, b.* from cle_tip_order a left join s_dictionary b ON a.order_statusval = b.value where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select (count(1) + 1) as serial from cle_tip_order where date_format(order_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into cle_tip_order (order_id, order_no, order_cle_orderid, order_cle_orderno, order_datetime, order_statusval, order_amount, order_paytype, order_userid, created_date, created_by, updated_date, updated_by, delete_flag ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCleOrderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCleOrderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatusval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
